resources.string: Add money to your PayPal balance in 3 easy steps:
1. First, snap a photo of each side of your signed check.
3. Once approved, void the check. We\'ll add money to your balance.

This service is provided by First Century Bank, N.A. and Ingo Money, Inc., which are third-party service providers that operate independently from PayPal. PayPal may share some of your profile information with Ingo and First Century to help service your Cash a Check request.
To cash your checks, we\'ll need access to your location, camera, and phone calls.
You\'ll be asked to give permission on the next screens.
You\'ll need to change your permissions to allow PayPal to access your camera, location, and phone calls.
